overview:
As president of Earth Class Mail, Sarah is responsible for day-to-day operations at the company and provides leadership internally as well as across Earth Class Mailâ€™s key customers and partners.

She was previously chief operating officer at the company. Prior to joining Earth Class Mail, she was the president and COO of Print, Inc., where her leadership increased the companyâ€™s performance and value, ultimately leading to an advantageous sale of the company to Pitney Bowes. In that role, Sarah had responsibility for overall company operations and day-to-day management of business initiatives, processes and functions.

Sarah has more than 20 years of leadership experience and achievement in senior management roles with leading financial and business-services firms both in the U.S. and internationally, including Bowne Global Solutions, The Thomson Corporation, Citibank, Shearson Lehman Hutton, Simon & Schuster and Deloitte and Touche.

Sarah received her bachelor’s degree in accounting from Lehigh University and has done executive course work at MIT and New York University.
